post.author: 강재형
post.content:
Title: Business application programmer (Spec Writer) (NOC: 2174)  
Terms of Employment: Casual, Full Time, Day
Salary: $15.00 to $30.00 Hourly for 40 hours per week, Bonus, Commission
Anticipated Start Date: 2002/08/19
Location: Toronto Centre, Ontario (1 vacancy)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Some college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training, Completion of college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training, Some university
Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Other: None required but helpful
Experience: 1 - 2 years
Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English
Work Setting Experience: Consulting firm
Operating Systems: MS Windows 95/98/NT/2000
Hardware Environment: IBM PC and compatibles
Applications: MS Excel, MS Office, MS Outlook, MS Word, SPSS, WinZip
Management Systems (erp or db): MS Access, MS SQL Server, MS Visual FoxPro
Other Information: KNOWLEDGE OF WINCROSS OR SPSS IS CRUCIAL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Employer: Confidential

How to Apply:  By Fax: (905) 713-3784
By E-mail: johnmayo@istar.ca

Advertised until: 2002/08/29
post.title: Business Application Programmer(Wincross or SPSS?)
